CatDescriptText: Related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 12, 1959, pg. A15, reads: "D.I. Aides and Models enjoy a sip of champagne at the party given at member Gloria Grate's beautiful new home as a preliminary to rehearsals for the glamorous fashion-dancing party at the New Arena, Jan. 3, from 5 to 10 P.M. Tickets are $4 per person, and may be secured from any member for the D.I. Club.  This second march of Dimes benefit will feature a specially created wardrobe for the National Foundation, and the D.I.'s will be the first to show them.  Some of these charming dolls will prance down the curving steps of the New Arena, Jan. 3, to the tunes of Wild Bill Davis and his combo.  Seated are Gloria Sweeney, Christine Sumpter and , standing [seated on back of sofa] Alberta Thompson and Marlene Franklin. - Harris Photo"
TitMainTitle: D. I. Club members Gloria Sweeney and Christine Sumpter, seated on sofa, and Alberta Thompson and Marlene Harris Franklin, gathered in home of Gloria Grate, possibly at 7413 Strananhan, for champagne party
